TopicTitle: Sentinel contract disappears upon reloading a quicksave

Articles.Content:
I accepted a Sentinel telescope contract after unlocking it. I noticed it had a target orbit around the sun to get to that ir did not show on the map screen for some reason, but I didn't think much of it. I launched the rocket with the telescope on it and got into a Kerbin orbit, then I looked at my contracts and I had 1 less because it was gone. Decided to try the launch again, same thing happened. Then I just went to my space station before launching the rocket, quicksaved, reloaded and it disappeared just the same.

Here is the exact contract

@Joose What Kopernicus planet pack(s) are you using?

Some planetary system mods have conflicts with asteroids and I think that's the cause of your issue. I could be wrong, though.

On 7/24/2024 at 1:54 PM, DeadJohn said:

@Joose What Kopernicus planet pack(s) are you using?

Some planetary system mods have conflicts with asteroids and I think that's the cause of your issue. I could be wrong, though.

Not using any. I do have Kopernicus but no planet packs or anything added

4 hours ago, Joose said:

Not using any. I do have Kopernicus but no planet packs or anything added

Does Kopernicus help anything if you're using stock planets? Consider uninstalling it to see if asteroid contracts work better.

15 hours ago, DeadJohn said:

Does Kopernicus help anything if you're using stock planets? Consider uninstalling it to see if asteroid contracts work better.

I have Parallax and BetterKerbol which require it. I could try to uninstall all of that and see if it works
